suggested_project.title: Echoes of the Ocean and Time
suggested_project.description: A themed collection exploring the interplay of oceanic imagery and temporal motifs, weaving together recurring symbols (ocean, time, lighthouse) into a cohesive set of poems, riddles, and visuals.
suggested_project.based_on: Multiple recent pieces featuring ocean, time, and lighthouse, suggesting a natural thematic convergence for a collection.

decisions: Prioritize initiating a new project due to absence of active ones.
Bias next creative effort toward project work to rebuild project-to-standalone ratio.
Leverage recurring ocean/time/lighthouse themes for a cohesive collection.
Monitor project progress; after project initiation, shift focus to completion as the project matures.
